items.sentence: Tom will stop doing that if you ask him to.
Tom will be picking Mary up at the station.
Tom went to a Halloween party last weekend.
Tom wasn't invited to the opening ceremony.
Tom was very sad when his grandmother died.
Tom was the only one who wasn't helping us.
Tom was the only one who wasn't doing that.
Tom was the only one who saw what happened.
Tom was still awake at 2:30 in the morning.
Tom was extremely grateful for Mary's help.
Tom wants to stay, but Mary wants to leave.
Tom wanted to tell Mary why he'd done that.
Tom told his children to behave themselves.
Tom steals from both the rich and the poor.
Tom started smoking when he was a teenager.
Tom spent the summer with his grandparents.
Tom spent all summer with his grandparents.
Tom said that he had a good time in Boston.
Tom opened his desk drawer to get a pencil.
Tom moved to Boston about three months ago.
Tom lived in the same neighborhood as Mary.
Tom knows how to contact me if he needs me.
Tom isn't the only person that can do that.
Tom is probably not even in Boston anymore.
Tom is in his room, listening to the radio.
Tom is going to fire Mary tomorrow morning.
Tom is going to bring his friends with him.
Tom is going to be at work on October 20th.
Tom is going to be at home on October 20th.
Tom is flying to Australia on October 20th.
Tom decided to go back to Boston with Mary.
Tom crossed the room and opened the window.
Tom couldn't understand why Mary hated him.
Tom couldn't remember where he hid the map.
Tom comes to Boston every week to see Mary.
Tom carried Mary's suitcase up to her room.
Tom carefully cut the tissue with scissors.
Tom can't afford to buy anything right now.
I missed seeing that movie. Did you see it?
Since it got warmer, I took off my sweater.
There is a gas station one kilometer ahead.
Can you take care of my dog while I'm away?
Mary groaned at another of Tom's dad jokes.
Tom doesn't have to know about any of this.
Tom woke up late and missed his final exam.
Tom challenged me to a cake-making contest.
Tom is doing well in his lessons at school.
All the attempts to rescue Tom have failed.
Tom said that he wanted to dance with Mary.
You do know what the problem is, don't you?
